title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around ollama with history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s chat sidebar.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local docs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chatbot (streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chatbot app that proxies to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-nuxt
summary: Nuxt 3 module that injects $ollama client; server-side streaming and composables included.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection friendly.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to call local Ollama models for summarizing notes or generating text.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async HTTP bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that chats through Ollama; supports group whitelist and per-user model choice.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter exposing OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing model files, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama projects.
